Address.label: Address
Address.value: THE HEIGHTS,BUILDING 5, FIRST FLOOR, WEYBRIDGE, KT13 0NY, United Kingdom

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Haleon PLC is a consumer healthcare company that provides personal healthcare products. The group conducts business internationally across five consumer healthcare categories: Oral Health, Pain Relief, VMS, Respiratory Health and Digestive Health and Other. Its reportable and geographical segments include North America; Europe, Middle East, Africa and Latin America (EMEA and LatAm) and Asia Pacific (APAC). It generates maximum revenue from EMEA and LatAm segments.
